about_the_game:
Impossible Island is an exciting adventure game that combines elements of strategy, exploration, and survival. Players become part of an expedition that is stranded on a mysterious island and must face various challenges to survive and uncover the secrets of the island.

Game Features

  • Mysterious Island: A vast and detailed island waiting to be explored. Different climatic zones, dense forests, high mountains, and deep caves make this world rich in various animal species and natural dangers.

  • Resource Management: During exploration, you need to gather food, water, and other resources to survive. Use the collected resources strategically to build shelters, set traps, and protect yourself from enemies.

  • Puzzles and Secrets: Discover ruins of ancient civilizations and secret passages in the depths of the island. By solving challenging puzzles, you can open new areas and learn more about the island's history.

  • Dangerous World: During exploration, you will encounter various enemies. Dangerous creatures and natural challenges will make your struggle for survival harder. Think strategically to confront your enemies and develop the necessary survival tactics.

  • Multiplayer Mode: Play together with your friends to overcome challenges. By collaborating, you can gather resources, defeat enemies, and uncover the island's secrets together.

  • Dynamic Weather System: The game features a dynamic weather system that provides a more realistic experience. Rain, storms, and day-night cycles will influence your strategy and increase the significance of every moment.

Impossible Island is not just a survival game; it's an experience filled with exploration, friendship, and strategy. Are you ready to dive into this dangerous yet fascinating world and uncover the secrets of the island? Click to start your adventure!

content_descriptors.notes: you play a pirate in our game, there is sword and gun combat and use of magic in our game but no blood effects. Consumption on alcohols is simply for the sake of replenishing stats.

  • OS: Windows 10 Anniversary
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 (2.7 GHz 4 Core) / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X (3.5 GHz 4 Core) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on board

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

short_description: You're an ex-pirate stranded on a mysterious island and you need to hunt and build houses to survive. You must face challenges and enemies. You must solve mysteries and open locked doors. Explore this mysterious island alone or with other pirate friends
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Greek, Czech, Swedish
